modName: What lies beneath the Shrine of Azura
summary:
A new area added right under Azura\'s Shrine. Entrance can be found at the foot of the mountain where the Shrine of Azura is located.

The undead have captured Azura\'s Sanctuary! Help her take it back. You will be rewarded.
descriptionHtml:
The undead have captured Azura\'s Sanctuary! Help her take it back. You will be rewarded.

To find Azura\'s Sanctuary, go West of the Shrine of Azura, you will find the entrance at the foot of the mountain (SEE IMAGE GALLERY).

[youtube] FHcsdNzjKoI [/youtube]
author: Smike
